name: Calabar Carnival Museum
description: Museum celebrating the history and costumes of the Calabar Carnival — interactive exhibits and seasonal events.

name: Tinapa Business and Leisure Resort
address: Tinapa Free Zone, Calabar, Cross River
description: Free trade zone and entertainment complex with shops, cinemas, and waterways — a modern business and leisure hub.

name: Mary Slessor Heritage Site
address: Mary Slessor Ave, Calabar, Cross River
description: Historical site honoring missionary Mary Slessor with a small museum and garden overlooking the town.

name: Kwa Falls Nature Park
address: Kwa Falls Rd, Etung LGA, Cross River
description: Scenic waterfalls and picnic areas, popular for short hikes and nature photography.

name: Calabar Botanical Gardens
address: Botanical Gardens, Murtala Mohammed Hwy, Calabar
description: A peaceful green space with native plants, walking paths, and shaded benches for visitors.

name: Slave History Museum
address: Old Trade House, Calabar Marina, Calabar
description: A reflective museum documenting local colonial history and the trans-Atlantic slave trade.

name: Old Residency Museum
description: A restored colonial residence turned museum with period rooms and local exhibits.

name: Marina Waterfront Park
description: Open waterfront park with promenades, food stalls, and evening cultural performances.
